thread.title: Good location. Quiet and comfortable.
thread.title_full: Good location. Quiet and comfortable. - Review of Citadines Trocadero Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Cafetin_BsAs
title: Good location. Quiet and comfortable.
text: The hotel location is great, very close to Trocadero Gardens/Eiffel Tower but also walking distance to the Arch of Triumph. I was in a studio, very comfortable room, clean and modern equipment, with a great kitchenette. No noise at all. Very recommendable hotel.
